name: Lost Ocean
description:
Presenting my first game I've made "Lost Ocean" 

A lot of time and support have helped me make this retro arcade game so huge thanks to all those that had helped me finish it!

Lost Ocean is a simple two-player retro space-shooter, inspired by one of the first games ever made 'SPACE WAR.'

Both of you are lost in a sea of stars and trapped inside an inescapable reality! There are no limits and there are no rules.  Avoid the enemies plasma shots whilst flying through space. flying will not be easy with the pull of the Void Maelstrom thats found in the center of this dimension...

Can one hope to beat the other? Is there really a way out of this reality? Is there an end? 

YOU DECIDE!!

  • Two Player 
  • Arena Shooter
  • Retro Pixel Art

Created by Kasian Tini / Happyday Games
